scripts.setup: FOLDER=$(basename $PWD) && cp ~/conductor/repos/lundflix/.env .env && sed -i '' "s|^APP_URL=.*|APP_URL=https://${FOLDER}.test|" .env && sed -i '' "s|^DB_DATABASE=.*|DB_DATABASE=${FOLDER}|" .env && mysql -uroot -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS \`${FOLDER}\`; CREATE DATABASE \`${FOLDER}\`" && herd secure && ln -sf ~/Herd/lundflix/auth.json auth.json && composer install --no-interaction && php artisan key:generate --no-interaction && php artisan migrate --no-interaction && php artisan db:seed --no-interaction && php artisan storage:link --no-interaction && npm install && npm run build && php artisan scout:sync-index-settings --no-interaction && php artisan scout:import 'App\Models\Movie' --no-interaction && php artisan scout:import 'App\Models\Show' --no-interaction
scripts.teardown: FOLDER=$(basename $PWD) && herd unsecure "${FOLDER}.test" --silent && mysql -uroot -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS \`${FOLDER}\`"
